short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert text case to Sentence case, lower case, UPPER CASE, Capitalized Case

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides multiple options to change the case of the text. You can convert text case to the following cases:

1. Sentence case
2. Lower case
3. Upper Case
4. Capitalized Case
